applicant-name.name: NANJING TONGYOU INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
南京通幽智能科技有限公司

invention-title: Fuel cell and manufacturing method thereof
一种燃料电池及其制作方法

abstract.p: The invention discloses a fuel cell and a manufacturing method thereof, the fuel cell comprises a plurality of membrane electrode preforms, a cell shell and end covers at two ends of the cell shell, the plurality of membrane electrode preforms are arranged in parallel to form an electric pile which is positioned in the cell shell, the outer surfaces of the membrane electrode preforms are provided with air-permeable and water-permeable second electrodes, and the second electrodes are connected in parallel in the shell through a conductive material. An electrode terminal is led out to serve as a cathode; the first electrode layers of the membrane electrodes are connected in parallel through conductive materials and are led out through electrode terminals to serve as anodes; a hollow inner cavity is exposed out of the two end faces of the electric pile, the end cover comprises a first through hole, and the first through hole and the hollow inner cavity are communicated to form a hydrogen channel; the side face of the shell comprises a second through hole, and the second through hole is communicated with the outer side of the second electrode layer of the electric pile to form an oxygen and generated water channel. According to the scheme, the multilayer coaxial hollow fiber composite membrane electrode is adopted, so that the membrane area of effective catalytic oxidation-reduction reaction of the fuel cell in unit volume can be greatly increased, and the energy density and the power density of the fuel cell are improved.

本发明公开一种燃料电池及其制作方法，包括一种膜电极预制体、电池壳体和电池壳体两端端盖，多条膜电极预制体平行排列成电堆位于电池壳体内，膜电极预制体的外表面有透气透水的第二电极，其中，第二电极在壳体用导电材料并联，并通过电极端子引出作为阴极；膜电极的第一电极层通过导电材料并联，并通过电极端子引出作为阳极；电堆在两端面露出中空内腔，端盖包括第一通孔，第一通孔和中空内腔导通为氢气的通道；外壳侧面包括第二通孔，第二通孔与电堆的第二电极层外侧导通为氧气和生成水的通道。本方案采用多层同轴中空纤维复合膜电极可以极大提高单位体积中燃料电池的有效催化氧化还原反应的膜面积，从而提高燃料电池的能量密度和功率密度。
